bot.create.ask_title:
Ok, let's create a new game! What should we call it?

(Or /cancel to cancel)
bot.create.title_success:
Great title! Now write a short description for the game (for example, gift budget).

Press the button or type "-" to skip.
bot.create.description_success:
Wonderful! Now send the list of participants. One participant per line.

Example:
Paul @durov
Alice @alice
@bob

app.meta_description: Organize perfect Secret Santa gift exchange. Create groups, add constraints, and get notified via Telegram.
app.header_subtitle: Organize a festive gift exchange! ğŸ…
app.support_description: SecretSanta is a small service for playing Secret Santa that I maintain and develop in my free time. If it helped you conveniently exchange gifts and saved you nerves â€” you can leave a donation for hosting and further improvements. This is voluntary and does not affect anything: the game will work for everyone the same way, regardless of donation.
app.support_thanks: Thank you for your support! â¤ï¸

welcome.hero_text: Create a new game, invite friends and let the magic begin. No one will know who their Secret Santa is until the reveal! ğŸ„
welcome.auth_prompt: or login to see your games:
welcome.step1_text: Enter a title and participant list or create an invite link. You can specify Telegram usernames for convenient notifications.
welcome.step2_text: Specify who cannot give to whom â€” for example, spouses or relatives. Everything will be taken into account!
welcome.step3_text: The algorithm will randomly assign participants into pairs. Everyone can find out their recipient via Telegram or a unique link.
welcome.step4_text: Participants log in through our bot @little_santa_bot or follow their unique link to discover who they're gifting to.
welcome.step5_text: Each participant can add a Wishlist â€” gift wishes that your Santa will see!
welcome.step6_text: If the exchange isn't local, add your delivery address â€” your Santa will know where to send the gift! ğŸ“¦
welcome.cta_text: Ready for the holidays? It takes only 2 minutes!
constraints.title: Who cannot gift to whom?
